ValidationRule.description: Breast Cancer Type Other field must be entered when the Breast Cancer Type "Other (please specify)" is selected
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL( Breast_Cancer_Type__c , "Other (please specify)"), ISBLANK( Breast_Cancer_Type_Other__c ) )&& (!$Setup.Bypass__c.Validation__c ||(LOWER($Setup.Bypass__c.SObject__c) <> "all" && LOWER($Setup.Bypass__c.SObject__c) <> "healthcloudga__ehrcondition__c"))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You indicated a Breast Cancer type of "Other" - please specify the type of breast cancer
